name: Pounamu Apartments

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Fantastic accommodation - we confirmed our booking after reading the reviews on tripadvisor. Rating number 1#, Pounamu Apartments lived up to EVERY expectation. The apartments were amazing, very modern, clean, yet warm and felt like a home. We loved it so much that we opted to 'stay in' with the gas fire, DVD, and surround sound for an important date rather than go into town. As a well travelled couple, the mountain views from the apartment and walking into Queenstown has to be one of the greatest sights ever. We also found the distance to town allowed us to do everything we needed to do without a car (incl. skiing). The cherry would have to be the every helpful and gracious staff.
reviews.title: Apartment and views even better than the photos!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled with friends
reviews.text: I've stayed here twice before and both times were perfect. It was a treat waking each morning to breathtaking views of the remarkables and lake. All apartments are very modern and clean with everything you would need for a more than pleasant stay. Loved the fireplace and big tv! Plenty of heating that keeps you nice and warm and the kitchen was great for cooking meals. Computer and free internet was a plus. Only a couple of minutes from town centre where there are plenty of restaurants, bars and shops. The perfect place to relax after a big day on the slopes! Very friendly staff as well. Highly recommended place to stay. I have no doubt you will want to come back for more.
reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: Brilliant place, very well appointed apartments with all the facilities you could hope for a week with a toddler. Underground parking was welcome given we were there to ski and the apartment was very warm with underfloor heating, central heating and a gas fireplace. Pay TV, internet included in the price which was welcome. Best of all was waking up to the amazing view across the lake and mountains.
reviews.title: Fantastic place, great location, amazing views.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Service was very good.
reviews.title: Very contemporary & beautifully appointed...but the location?

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed in a one bedroom apartment at Pounamu for 5 nights in August 2009.
reviews.title: Amazing views, amazing accommodation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: rooms are amazing and that alone is the best reason to stay here. the value is good.
reviews.title: great rooms but bad service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: service is terrible. reception doesn't know anything about the area activities and although might book if forced, can't recommend any of them so pretty useless. when leaving tried to print boarding pass but they wouldn't let us. Not sure if they are like this to everyone or just got the wrong person.
reviews.title: Lakeview apartments superior design/facilities vs noisy highway's night-long negatives

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: only other neg is that it is a slight walk from town but actually i liked that better. despite the service, the place was great and would stay here a again.
reviews.title: Luxury apartments close to Queenstown's centre

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The facilities are excellent and, for this reason alone, we were glad we chose to pay a bit more for the upgrade to the lake view apartment rather than sticking with the one room studio at the back of the complex.
reviews.title: Relax by the gas fire in your luxury apartment.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Positives: New, well designed, clean, good value and professional and attentive management (too attentive for the poor fellow who was wheel clamped for being in the wrong parking spot).
reviews.title: Fantastic Pad for a Queenstown Adventure

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Fantastic location - 15mins walk from centre of town; amazing design - functional (steam-proof bathroom mirror), computer AND free Internet; great view of lake; cheap and very comfortable.
reviews.title: Quite simply - Unbeatable!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If all hotels were like this, the world would be a better place!
reviews.title: Fantastic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled with friends
reviews.text: This place is amazing! We were on a busy schedule whilst in Queenstown but it was lovely to come back to our gorgeous apartment at the end of the day. We didn't want to leave again to go out to dinner! The apartments are beautifully set up & the views are incredible. Great privacy. Definatly recommend for everybody! By far the best place to stay in Queenstown.
reviews.title: Pure Indulgence at an affordable price - what a treat

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Imagine a place just near the hub of town to enjoy a good meal or visit the beautiful buildings that abound but far enough not to be plagued by the noise. The apartments are absolutely gorgeous. Sleek and modern with all the comforts of home and more. The views of the lake are incredible. The whole aura reeks of sophisticated elegance and divine for a weekend of romance or just for a luxurious treat. The staff are welcoming yet unobtrusive. All you really need is a bottle of bubble (the drinking and bathing kind) and the chocolates , fireplace and surround sound are all provided.
reviews.title: Fantastic View, good location, comfortable ergonomic unit, terrible internet

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A very well priced apartment, very comfortable and roomy, with all amenities except for pool and hot tub. Would be nice if spa was on site. Internet needs improvement.
reviews.title: Beautiful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: My husband, 2 year old and I stayed at Pounamu Apartments for 6 nights. The apartment was clean, new and modern. It was an absolute pleasure to return to the apartment after a day of skiing to sit and relax. I would reccommend it to anyone. The only disadvantage would be road noise from the main road, which you don't hear once you close the doors and shutters to the bedroom!!
reviews.title: Wonderful place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staying at Pounamu, with the gas fire, heated flooring,real shower and spectacular views of the mountains and golf course. Was only exacerbated by the helpful nature of Leo one of the mangers, with his local knowledge and nothing was too hard attitude made a great expereince for us even better. The apartments were clean and fully contained every thing down to the corkscrew was provided, in a clean and pristine way. When booking make sure you have time to ask Leo about in house massage (mobil massage) it was great!!! web address www.pounamuapartments.co.nz
reviews.title: Nothing that they couldn't do or didn't have

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed for 8 nights whilst snowboarding in Queenstown. Apartment was excellent & I would highly recommend it to any 4-1/2 star traveller. Plan to stay again next year.
reviews.title: Perfect

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Judy & Neil
reviews.title: Very Nice, Very Comfortable, Warm, Great Views, Great People

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: Great Place to say, I always think if I can say I stay there again its a good sign, and I definatly would in this case!
reviews.title: Beautiful Apartments with amazing views!

description: Relax in style and soak up the spectacular views of Lake Wakatipu and The Remarkables in our 1 or 2 bedroom spacious, self-contained or serviced Apartments. Each Apartment has an open plan lounge, dining and full kitchen facilities, gas fire, under-floor heating, Sky TV, ensuite bathroom with shared laundry amenities. A separate office area with computer/printer/fax. Our Studio Rooms a like a small hotel room with kitchenette and ensuite bathroom (NO Views). Facilities include FREE unlimited Wi-Fi Internet and FREE local calls. Complimentary secure under cover Car Park with Ski/Golf Locker, BBQ area and outside Spa Pool. We also have a "Pet Friendly" Apartment. Sleeping configuration King Beds. Single beds can be requested at the time of your booking. Just a 10 min walk to Queenstown town centre and approx 20 min drive to the ski fields makes these beautifully appointed Apartments a must for your stay.Enquire about special seasonal rates and tempting promotional offers, and at Pounamu Apartments, be assured of a warm, welcoming visit to this ‘Remarkable’ region.
